Windlord:

Windlord transformed quickle to his robot mode and with his two 
machineguns (that are in his arms), he fired at swords trying to 
deflect them


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 3/30/03 11:37:03 PM Central Standard Time, 
> roborick007@y... writes:
> 
> 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : : Rodimus took notice of Maxima comeing at 
him. He 
> > recognized the voice from the past. Rodimus Prime: Can't say I'm 
happy to 
> > see you functioning. Now out of my way you Decepticon b*tch! 
Maxima's 
> > attack had a very big flaw. Although she managed to slice a bit 
of Rodimus' 
> > hood, she failed to realize what a sports care going at speeds 
over 200mph 
> > would do. He simply plowed into her without careing in the least 
for the 
> > Decepticon femme. This would surely cause some heavy damage to 
Maxima. 
> > 
> > 
> 
> Knocked away from Windlord, as the hulking form of Rodimus throw 
her back 
> quite a ways. Letting out a feline yelp/growl as her form slid & 
rolled away 
> from the collision she sustained from Rodimus. 
> 
> Wincing, she growled. Yeah... it did cause damage ... that & it 
was quite 
> painful. Struggling to get up, she collapsed. Then attempted to 
get up 
> again... her clear blue optics glared at Rodimus, through her 
teeth, she bit 
> out, "I'm not that easy to put down... Auto-FOOL!" 
> 
> Despite something that Hydras told her some time ago, she 
dismissed it 
> quickly. She was a Decepticon. She had continued to function this 
long... 
> there was NO way that this Autobot will take her down now. 
> 
> She stood partly up, & pulled out her tail, as it seperated into 2 
components 
> - 2  energy swords. She threw them both at Rodimus. "Ashes to 
ashes.. 
> Rodimus! Just like PRIME!" One destroyed Leader for vengence for 
another. It 
> was still a very sour & sore spot to her... Megatron's demise.... 
becoming 
> Galvatron... the isolation... the torture... nothingness.... Yes, 
Rodimus was 
> a part of it, & she would make sure he would pay for it all.
